text_importexport_content: Hano urashobora gutumiza no kohereza ibicuruzwa byawe muburyo bwa Netscape.
text_help_content:
Ibimenyetso biranga umuyobozi ni porogaramu ifasha kubika no guhindura ibimenyetso bya interineti. umutwe hanyuma amaherezo URL, hanyuma ukande kubika kugirango ubike impinduka, cyangwa ukande gusiba kugirango usibe ikimenyetso, cyangwa usubire inyuma kugirango uhindure impinduka ariko ugumane ikimenyetso.

Kanda buto "fungura" hafi yikimenyetso kugirango fungura URL ijyanye.

Kanda buto "ongera" imbere mububiko kugirango wongereho ikintu gishya.

Kubimenyetso byombi hamwe nububiko, kanda buto "guhindura" kugirango uhindure bo, kanda buto "kwimuka inyuma" kugirango uhindure umwanya hamwe nibintu byabanjirije, kanda buto "komeza imbere" kugirango uhindure umwanya hamwe nikindi kintu gikurikira, kanda buto "kwimuka hejuru" kugirango ukure ibintu mububiko aho kuri ubu ni, cyangwa ukande buto "kwimuka hepfo" kugirango wimure ibintu imbere mububiko bukurikira.

Muri menu igenamiterere, iragerwaho nyuma yo gukanda ahanditse "igenamiterere", urashobora guhisha cyangwa kwerekana guhindura, kugenda no kongeramo buto. Birashoboka kandi guhindura imvugo yimikoreshereze yukoresha.

Kuzana cyangwa kohereza ibicuruzwa, kanda kumashusho yo gutumiza / kohereza hanze. Imiterere ya HTML Netscape Ibimenyetso birashyigikirwa, birashoboka rero ko twinjiza ibicuruzwa byashyizwe ahagaragara na mushakisha nkuru nkuru. Mugihe utumiza ibicuruzwa muri dosiye, ibimenyetso byubu bizasibwa kandi byandike. Iyo uyishizeho, mugihe ibice bya mushakisha biterekanwa, iracyakora imbere muri mushakisha. Ibimenyetso byabitswe mububiko bwa mushakisha bwibanze bwibimenyetso.marcoparrone.com. localStorage ikora neza hamwe na Chrome, Edge na Firefox. Abandi bashakisha barashobora gusiba localStorage nyuma yigihe runaka. Android muburyo busanzwe ikoresha Chrome, Windows muburyo busanzwe ikoresha Edge. Umuyobozi wibimenyetso kuri ubu ntabwo ashyigikiwe nibicuruzwa bya Apple. Hamwe nintego yo gufasha gukumira igihombo cyibimenyetso, birasabwa gukora backup ukoresheje imikorere "yohereza hanze", burigihe burigihe uhinduye bimwe udashaka gutakaza.
text_about_content1:

Uburenganzira bwose burasubitswe.

ARIKO NTIBISHOBOKA KUBURYO BWO GUCURUZA, KUBONA INTEGO ZIDASANZWE KANDI BIDASANZWE. NTA KINTU CYIZABA ABAYOBOZI CYANGWA ABAFATANYABIKORWA BAKORESHEJWE KUBURYO BURUNDU, INDISHYI CYANGWA IZINDI NINSHINGANO, NUBWO MU GIKORWA CY'AMASEZERANO, TORT CYANGWA IBINDI BIKORWA, BIKURIKIRA CYANGWA BIKORESHEJWE NA SOFTW. SOFTWARE.
text_about_content2: IYI SERIVISI IRASHOBORA GUHINDUKA BISHOBORA GUKORESHWA NA GOOGLE. GOOGLE YEREKANA INTAMBARA ZOSE ZIFATANYIJWE N'UBUHINDUZI, BIDASANZWE CYANGWA BIKORESHEJWE, HARIMO INTWARO ZOSE Z'UKURI, UKWIZERA, N'INGINGO ZOSE ZIKORESHEJWE MU BIKORWA BY'UBUCURUZI.
text_about_content3:
Iyi porogaramu y'urubuga yahinduwe kugirango bikworohereze ukoresheje software yubuhinduzi ikoreshwa na Google Translate. Hashyizweho ingufu zifatika zo gutanga ibisobanuro nyabyo, ariko, nta buhinduzi bwikora butunganye kandi ntibugamije gusimbuza abasemuzi. Ubuhinduzi butangwa nka serivisi kubakoresha urubuga rwa marcoparrone.com, kandi butangwa "nkuko biri." Nta garanti y'ubwoko ubwo aribwo bwose, bwerekanwe cyangwa bwerekanwe, bukozwe ku bijyanye n'ukuri, kwizerwa, cyangwa gukosora ibisobanuro byose byakozwe kuva mu Cyongereza mu rundi rurimi. Ibirimo bimwe (nk'amashusho, videwo, Flash, nibindi) ntibishobora guhindurwa neza kubera imbogamizi za software yubuhinduzi.

Inyandiko yemewe ni verisiyo yicyongereza y'urubuga. Ibinyuranyo cyangwa itandukaniro ryakozwe mubusemuzi ntabwo ari itegeko kandi nta ngaruka zemewe n'amategeko zubahiriza cyangwa intego zo kubahiriza. Niba hari ikibazo kivutse kijyanye nukuri kwamakuru akubiye kurubuga rwahinduwe, reba verisiyo yicyongereza yurubuga arirwo rwemewe.
